metadata.name: Ritual, Vol. 1
metadata.description: The sleepy Pennsylvanian town of Black Root suffers a spate of bizarre ritualistic slayings, reminiscent of the 17th-century Salem Witch Trials. The FBI assumes jurisdiction over the case, but they have no idea that the supernatural killer is a long-dead witch hunter with a perverse desire for revenge! Screenwriter Andy Briggs brings his pen from the Sci-Fi Channel to this suspenseful new mini-series, with newcomer Shawn McCauley providing atmospheric artwork.
